mapper.select: select * from t_board order by b_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_board(b_title, b_content,b_file ,m_nick, b_category) values(#{b_title}, #{b_content}, #{b_file}, #{m_nick}, #{b_category})
mapper.update: update t_board set b_title = #{b_title}, b_content = #{b_content} where b_seq = #{b_seq}
